title: My Shop Reset
body:
I heard that there was going to be a "Your Shop" reset. I was wondering if I could still possibly get a skin from there? It was the winter orianna skin priced at  487 RP. I was really looking forward to purchasing this skin to get home where my shop was disabled? Someone from riot also did say you can still honor deals from our last shop. So please riot let me purchase this orianna skin, I've been waiting for this skin for a very long time.

Here's an image of what my shop looked like:

[IMG] http://i65.tinypic.com/29osahd.png[/IMG]

replies.body: u need to be specific on which skin and dam most i had on mine was 40% off
tell me about it. Warring Kingdoms Xin Zhao 70% off now its gone
Uh they did they said the orianna winter wonderland skin

There was an issue with the Shop, and has been disabled temporarily.  There is more info on the [announcement ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/REhwqdew-your-shop-is-open?comment=005a)page, but If you saw something you liked, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our team can considering honoring it.

> [{quoted}](name=HippieHarem,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3xm96EF7,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-19T14:46:43.755+0000)
>
> Send in a ticket

yeah thanks thats what I did! Hopefully I can get that skin again in my next shop
